fields.title: Morning in the Hollow
fields.content: Woke up with the first sun rays. Stockpiled so many nuts yesterday — winter will be full and cozy!
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Rain in the Woods
fields.content: It’s been pouring all day. Watching raindrops slide off the leaves from my hollow. Tomorrow will be great for mushrooms!
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Close Call with a Fox
fields.content: Almost got caught by a fox today! But I’m quick — zipped up the oak in a flash. Gotta stay alert.
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Mushroom Season Begins
fields.content: Found a huge porcini under a pine tree! Marked the spot — coming back tomorrow with my little satchel.
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Winter Preparations
fields.content: Started hiding nuts all over the forest. Built 20 secret caches already! Safety in numbers.
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Ice Glaze Morning
fields.content: The trees are coated in ice today. Slippery branches, but wow — the whole forest sparkles like crystal!
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Helped a Little Neighbor
fields.content: A baby squirrel lost her mom. Helped her find a safe hollow and shared some hazelnuts. Her name is Masha.
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Acorn Hunt Success
fields.content: Best acorn harvest in weeks! Found a hidden oak grove untouched by other foragers. My secret spot!
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: First Snowfall
fields.content: Snow blankets the forest. Quiet, soft, and peaceful. Time to stay warm inside and dream of spring buds.
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty

fields.title: Bird Friends Visit
fields.content: Chickadees came by today. Shared sunflower seeds from last summer’s stash. They chirped me a new forest song!
fields.author: Squirrel Rusty
